item.title: Static Site Generators
item.description: Static site generators are tools that generates static sites i.e. pure html websites without backend data processing, session management or user authentication system. It should be well enough for running a blog. How static site generators work? Write your posts in markdown or rst. Run the static site generator to parse these posts into html. Upload the generated output to any server that serves html (or even host it in github pages).
